column7: Nue (bird-like creature sent by Douman while impersonating Shingen)

column5:
タカは　ヌエの　しょうたいを\n
あらわし　おそってきた
column6:
The hawk revealed its true nature.\n
The Nue sprang forward!

column5:
ハハハハハ・・・　ジライアよ！\n
おまえも　これで　ジ・エンド！\n
まあ　よく　やったと　ほめておこう！
column6:
Hahahaha!\n
I told you this would be the end, Ziria!

column5:
なぜ　おまえが\n
ヘビの　弓矢を　もっているんだ！
column6: Where did you find the Snake Bow?!

column5:
まあ　よいわ\n
この　けっちゃくは　塩山で　つけよう
column6:
Well, no matter!\n
We'll settle our score in the Salt Pyramid.

column5:
塩山に　来い！　ジライアよ！！\n
ナメクジ玉は　それまで　あずかる\n
ハハハハハ・・・・
column6:
Come to the Salt Pyramid, Ziria!\n
I'll hold on to the Slug Orb in the meantime...Hahahaha!

column5:
トノさまは\n
モウリョウに　変身した！
column6: The lord transformed into a Mouryou!

column5:
ひゃ　ひゃ　ひゃ\n
ヤシャ姫さまの　手を\n
わずらわせるまでも　なかったのぉ
column6:
Hya hya hya!\n
Yashahime-sama didn't have to trouble herself after all!

column5:
ひゃ　ひゃ　ひゃ\n
わしを　たおしたところで\n
二人では　ヤシャ姫さまには　勝てぬさ
column6:
Hya hya hya!\n
You may defeat me, but you two will never defeat Yashahime-sama!

column5:
ツナデと　ホテイ丸が\n
かまくら城で　まっているぞ\n
急いで　追いかけたほうが　いいぞ！
column6: Tsunade and Hoteimaru are in Kamakura Castle. You'd better hurry before it's too late to save them!

column5: ポンポコリン！
column6: Ponpokorin!

column5:
ここは　とーせんぼだ！\n
筑波の国は　水戸の　ゴーモンさまから\n
オレがもらう　約束をしたんだ！
column6:
You're not going anywhere!\n
Goumon-sama of Mito will give me the lands of Tsukuba once I beat you!

column5:
ホウ　こんなとこまで　来たか！！\n
ジライアとやら！　ほめてやろう！
column6:
Hmph! I see you've made it this far.\n
Ziria, was it? I suppose congratulations are in order!

column5:
オレが　大門教１３人衆の　１番手\n
地獄の　魔術師　ゴーモンだ！！\n
おまえでは　オレには　勝てんぞ！！
column6:
I am the first of the Thirteen Daimon Cultists, the Hell Magician Goumon!\n
You don't stand a chance against me!

column5:
めいどの　みやげに\n
オレの　ほんとうの姿を\n
みせてやろう！！
column6: You deserve a little boon before your death...I will show you my true form!

column5:
火の勇者などと　いっても\n
しょせん　その　ていどの　ものよ！\n
ワハハハハハ！！
column6: Hmph! Looks like I've snuffed the flame of the Fire Hero! Bwahahahaha!

column5:
シマッタ！　あまく　みたわ\n
だが　１３人衆の残りが　かならず\n
おまえを　たおす！　かならずな！！
column6:
Curses! I underestimated you!\n
But one of my fellow cultists will kill you without fail! Just you wait!

column5:
大門教１３人衆の　１番手\n
ゴーモンを　倒した！\n
あと　残りは　１２人！！
column6:
You have defeated Goumon, the first of the Thirteen Daimon Cultists!\n
There are twelve cultists left!

column5:
ワレこそは　人間どもを　支配する\n
タマモ姫なり！！\n
ジャマする　ものは　ようしゃせぬ！
column6: I am Tamamohime, rightful ruler of men! Death to those who defy me!

column5:
ホホホホホ\n
みたか！　タマモの　おそろしさ！
column6:
Hoh hoh hoh hoh!\n
Now you know why I am so feared!

column5:
おぼえておれ！\n
この　うらみ　わすれぬぞ！！
column6:
How dare you?!\n
You will rue this day!!

column5:
おのれ！　ジライア！\n
こんどは　生かして　おかん！\n
タマモの　おそろしさ　みせてやる！！
column6:
Curse you, Ziria!\n
I'll show no mercy this time!\n
Tremble in fear before Tamamo!

column5:
ジパングの　勇者の　力とは\n
そんなものかよ　ジライア\n
ホホホホホホ
column6:
Is that all the {hero} of Jipang has to offer? How pathetic, Ziria!\n
Hoh hoh hoh hoh!

column5:
われは　千人の王の　首をはねた\n
大門教１３人衆の２番手　キュウビなり\n
ほんとうの　おそろしさを　見るがいい
column6: I am the second of the Thirteen Daimon Cultists, Kyuubi, killer of a thousand kings! Behold true terror!

column5:
タマモ姫は\n
キュウビに　変身した！
column6: Tamamohime transformed into Kyuubi!

column5:
ホホホホホホ\n
おもい　しったか\n
この　キュウビの　力を！
column6:
Hoh hoh hoh hoh!\n
Now you understand the might of Kyuubi!

column5:
く　くやしや\n
かならず　おまえたちの　ゆくてに\n
タタリが　あるぞよ
column6:
How...disgraceful...\n
A curse upon your journey!\n
May it be full of pain and hardships!

column5:
大門教１３人衆の　２番手\n
キュウビを　倒した！\n
あと　残りは　１１人！！
column6:
You have defeated Kyuubi, the second of the Thirteen Daimon Cultists!\n
There are eleven cultists left!

column5:
オニ族の　大将　あくろう王だ！\n
おまえに　ウラミは　ないが\n
大門教の　命令じゃ　かくご！！
column6:
I am the Oni general, King Akurou!\n
I have nothing against you, but the Cult of Daimon has ordered your death!

column5: しかた　ないのだ・・・　ゆるせよ！
column6: I have no choice. Forgive me.

column5:
みごとだ　ジライア！\n
おれは　どうなっても　かまわん！\n
しかし　話を　きいてくれ！
column6:
Well done, Ziria!\n
I ask only that you listen to my words before you do with me as you will.

column5:
だから　言うとるや　ないか\n
はよう　大門教に　入りて！\n
カメヘン　カメヘンって
column6: You shoulda joined the Cult of Daimon! C'mon, c'mon!

column5:
フン！　なんやねん！\n
これで　勝った　思うな！\n
この先　ジゴクが　まっとるで！
column6:
Hmph! This don't change nothin'!\n
Have fun goin' through Hell!
column7: ZenkiTN: this isn't a "I'll wait for you in hell", but more like "your future is going to be hell"

column5:
カメヘン　カメヘン\n
これで　こりたやろ\n
大門教に　入るんやな！
column6:
C'mon, c'mon!\n
Join the Cult of Daimon already!

column5:
まあ　カメヘン　カメヘン\n
ワテが　負けたかて　大門教にゃ\n
まだまだ　強いのが　おるさかい
column6:
Aw, c'mon, c'mon! Well, it don't matter!\n
The Cult of Daimon got more cultists ready to kick your butts!

column5:
大門教１３人衆の　４番手\n
カーメン　カーメンを　倒した！\n
あと　残りは　９人！！
column6:
You have defeated Khamen Khamen, the fourth of the Thirteen Daimon Cultists!\n
There are nine cultists left!

column5:
おおっ　サル酒だ！　もう　おまえに\n
用はない！　さっさと　かえれ！\n
ん？　おまえは　火の勇者だな
column6:
Hey, it's monkey booze! I'll take that!\n
Now get outta here!\n
...Wait. You're that Fire Hero dude!

column5:
オレさまを　大門教１３人衆の\n
マントーさまと　知って　来たのか！\n
しかし　おまえも　ここまでよ
column6: Don't you know I'm Manto, the strongest and coolest of the Thirteen Daimon Cultists? Whatever. You're dead meat!

column5:
キッ　キッ　キッ\n
この　むつ国は\n
マントーさまの　ものだ！
column6:
Chee chee chee!\n
The lands of Mutsu belong to me!

column5:
キーッ！　チクショー！\n
オレは　たおせても　大門教は\n
たおせんぞ！
column6:
Chee! You'll pay for this, you damn brat!\n
You haven't seen the last of the Cult of Daimon!

column5:
大門教１３人衆の　５番手\n
マントーを　倒した！\n
あと　残りは　８人！！
column6:
You have defeated Manto, the fifth of the Thirteen Daimon Cultists!\n
There are eight cultists left!

column5:
この　白い塩山を　おまえたち\n
勇者とかの　血で　まっかに\n
そめてやるわ！　ククク！
column6: I will paint this Salt Pyramid red with your {hero} blood! Bwahahaha!

column5:
にせ信玄は\n
ドーマンに　変身した！
column6: The false Shingen transformed into Douman!

column5:
クククク　しなの国　そして\n
この　ジパングは　われら\n
大門教の　ものだ！　クククク・・・
column6:
Bwahahaha! The lands of Shinano...\n
No, ALL of Jipang belongs to the Cult of Daimon!

column5:
ククク　クソッ！\n
勇者の　力が　これほど　とはな
column6:
Urgh...C-Curse it all!\n
The heroes weren't supposed to be this strong!

column5:
大門教１３人衆の　６番手\n
ドーマンを　倒した！\n
あと　残りは　７人！！
column6:
You have defeated Douman, the sixth of the Thirteen Daimon Cultists!\n
There are seven cultists left!

column5:
おまえたちの　力が　ほしかったが\n
いたしかた　あるまい！\n
おかくご！！
column6: You would have been useful pawns, but no matter. Prepare to die!

column5:
ハハハハ・・・　おもいしったか！\n
この　タランチェに　勝てるものか！！\n
あきらめて　筑波山に　お帰り！
column6:
Hahahaha! You could never defeat me!\n
Go back to your Mount Tsukuba and stay there!

column5:
グググ・・　このタランチェを\n
たおしても　江戸は\n
大門教で　いっぱいじゃ　ハハハ・・・
column6:
Urgh...This changes nothing...\n
The Cult of Daimon still controls Edo! Hahahaha...

column5:
大門教１３人衆の　７番手\n
タランチュを　倒した！\n
あと　残りは　６人！！
column6:
You have defeated Tarantul, the seventh of the Thirteen Daimon Cultists!\n
There are six cultists left!

column5:
くやしいか　ジライア！\n
何度でも　あいてに\n
なってやるぞ！
column6:
Are you mad, Ziria?\n
I'll challenge you whenever you like!

column5:
グググッ　わたしを　倒しても\n
大門教は　倒せぬぞ！！\n
大門教　バンザイ！！
column6:
Urgh...You may defeat me, but you'll never defeat the Cult of Daimon!\n
Long live Daimon!!

column5:
大門教１３人衆の　９番手\n
カーミラを　倒した！\n
あと　残り　４人！！
column6:
You have defeated Carmilla, the ninth of the Thirteen Daimon Cultists!\n
There are four cultists left!

column5:
ほう！　おまえ　ジライアだな！！\n
自分から　のこのこ　出てくるとは\n
バカな　やつよ！　てまが　はぶけたわ
column6: Oh-ho! Ziria! You came to me of your own accord? You must have a death wish! Saves me the hassle of hunting you down!

column5:
オレさまが　獄門島を\n
まかされている　大門教１３人衆\n
１０番手　ムテキオーよ！！！
column6:
I am the chief of Gokumon Island...\n
The tenth of the Thirteen Daimon Cultists, Mutekiou!

column5:
ハハハハハ・・・・\n
ワシに　かてる　わけが　ない！\n
ない！　ない！　ない！！
column6:
Bwahahahaha!\n
There is simply no way to defeat me!\n
No way! No way! NO WAY!

column5:
さあ　お望み　通り\n
獄門島へ　送ってやろう\n
死ぬまで　はたらくが　よい！
column6:
Now, to grant your wish...\n
I'll send you to Gokumon Island.\n
You're going to work until you drop dead!

column5:
大門教１３人衆の１１番手\n
水王丸だ！！　とうとう\n
ここまで　来たか　ジライアよ！！
column6: I am the eleventh of the Thirteen Daimon Cultists, Suioumaru! I should praise you for coming this far, Ziria.

column5:
だが　おまえたち　火の勇者が\n
どう　あがこうと　このジパングは\n
大門教の　ものになるのだ！！
column6: But the fate of Jipang is sealed, no matter how much you Fire Heroes struggle!

column5:
そして　われら\n
デーモン族が　すべてを　支配する！！\n
あきらめろ！　ジライア！！
column6:
The Demon clan shall conquer all!\n
Accept defeat and give up, Ziria!

column5:
われら　デーモン族の　まえに\n
すべては　ひれふすのだ！！\n
わかったか　ジライアよ！！
column6:
All shall kneel before the Demon clan!\n
Do you understand now, Ziria?

column5:
さすが　伝説の　勇者だな・・・\n
ここは　ひとまず　おまえに\n
勝ちを　ゆずる！　さらば！！
column6: You truly are the heroes from the legends...Victory is yours -- for now! Farewell!

column5:
おれだ　水王丸だ　ジライア！\n
よく　くるり城を　抜けられたな！\n
こんどは　地獄に　落としてやる！！
column6: Ziria! It's me, Suioumaru! You might have escaped from Kururi Castle, but the only place you're going from here is Hell!

column5:
水王丸は\n
クラーケンに　変身した！
column6: Suioumaru transformed into Kraken!

column5:
ハハハ・・・　おまえの　力では\n
大門教は　たおせん！！
column6: Bwahahaha! You'll never defeat the Cult of Daimon!

column5:
くやしいが・・・　おまえの　力は\n
スゴイ！！　し・・しかし\n
兄の　幻王丸には　つうじないな
column6:
I hate to admit this, but...you're strong!\n
E-Even so, you don't have what it takes to defeat my brother, Genoumaru!

column5:
大門教　１３人衆の　１１番手\n
クラーケンを　倒した！！\n
あと　残り　２人！　２人！！
column6:
You have defeated Kraken, the eleventh of the Thirteen Daimon Cultists!\n
There are only two cultists left!

column5:
幻王丸は\n
ベリエルに　変身した！
column6: Genoumaru transformed into Beliel!

column5:
ワシが　大門教の　ダンジョウじゃ！\n
この橋を　渡りたくば\n
その命を　おいていけ！
column6:
I am Danjou of the Cult of Daimon!\n
To cross this bridge, you must pay...\n
with your life!

column5: ウギャアァーッ！！
column6: AAARGH!!

column5:
また　会ったな！　ジライア！\n
ワシは　魔神像が　あるかぎり\n
不死身なのじゃ！！
column6:
We meet again, Ziria!\n
As long as the Demon Statue protects me, I am immortal!

column5: さあ　かかってくるがいい！！
column6: Prepare to die!

column5: ウギャアァーッ！！
column6: AAARGH!!

column5:
魔神像の　パワーが　あるかぎり\n
この　ダンジョウは　不死身だぞ！！\n
ワハハハハハハハ
column6: As long as the Demon Statue protects me, I will always come back! Mwahahahaha!

column5: ウギャアァーッ！！
column6: AAARGH!!

column5:
これが　わしの\n
本当の　すがたじゃ！！
column6: Behold my true form!

column5:
大門教　１３人衆の　３番手\n
ハーメルンとは　オレの　ことだ！！\n
ここが　おまえたちの　墓場よ！
column6:
I am the third of the Thirteen Daimon Cultists, Hamelin!\n
Welcome to your grave!

column5:
ワッ　ハハハ　バカめ！\n
この　ハーメルンさまに\n
勝てる　わけが　ないわ！
column6:
Mwahahaha!\n
You never stood a chance!

column5:
ウギャアァーッ！！\n
[color]<$01>大門教１３人衆の　３番手\n
ハーメルンを　倒した！！
column6:
AAARGH!!\n
[color]<$01>You have defeated Hamelin, the third of the Thirteen Daimon Cultists!

column5: あと　残りは　１０人！！
column6: There are ten cultists left!

column5:
もうかってまっか！\n
大門教の１３人衆の　８番手\n
ゴーヨックだす！
column6:
How's business, pal?\n
I'm the eighth of the Thirteen Daimon Cultists, Gouyokku!
column7: ZenkiTN: もうかってまっか is a typical Osaka greeting. It means "How's business?" (or more literally, "Are you earning money?". Typically, you answer with ぼちぼちでんな, "It's alright."

column5:
こんどは　負けへんで！\n
わしも　本気　だしまっせ！\n
いくで　ジライア！！
column6:
It's time I got serious.\n
You ain't beatin' me this time, Ziria!

column5:
南蛮屋は\n
ゴーヨックに　変身した！
column6: The merchant transformed into Gouyokku!

column5:
こんどは　本気や　いうたやろ\n
また　来てな\n
ほな　さいなら！！
column6:
Told ya I was gettin' serious!\n
Better luck next time. Buh-bye!

column5:
わし　もう　あかんわ\n
ほな　さいなら
column6: Y-Ya got me good...Buh-bye...

column5:
大門教１３人衆の　８番手\n
ゴーヨックを　倒した！\n
あと　残りは　５人！！
column6:
You have defeated Gouyokku, the eighth of the Thirteen Daimon Cultists!\n
There are five cultists left!

column5:
大門教１３人衆の　１２番手！\n
ベリエルを　倒した！！\n
あと　残り　わずか　一人　一人！！
column6:
You have defeated Beliel, the twelfth of the Thirteen Daimon Cultists!\n
There is only one cultist left!

column5:
１０００年の\n
長き　ねむりから　今　めざめた！
column6: After one thousand years, I have awoken from my slumber!

column5:
われは　ゆるさぬ！\n
われを　うらぎった　ジパングの民を！\n
われを　とじこめた　火の一族を！
column6: I shall have my revenge...Upon the people of Jipang, for their betrayal! Upon the Fire Clan, for sealing me away!

column5:
このジパング　すべてを\n
破壊し　殺りくするため\n
われは　ふっかつ　した！
column6: I have returned to obliterate Jipang, to slaughter every living being!

column5:
われは　マサカド！\n
ジパングの　王なり！
column6: I am Masakado, true sovereign of Jipang!

column5:
われの　ゆくところ\n
すべて　死あるのみ！
column6: All that stands in my way shall be eradicated!

column5:
われは　マサカド\n
このジパングの　王なり！
column6: I am Masakado, true sovereign of Jipang!

column5: 破壊と　殺りくのため　よみがえった！
column6: I have returned to bring ruin and blood!

column5:
われは　マサカド・・・\n
ああ・・・　また　火の一族か・・・\n
ちからが・・・　ちからが・・・
column6:
I am Masakado...\n
Aah...The Fire Clan, again...?\n
My strength...my strength is...

column5:
われは　ふたたび　地の底で\n
深い　深い　ねむりに　おちる・・・
column6: I shall once more fall into slumber, deep, deep within the earth...

column5:
だが　いつの日か　かならず・・・\n
この世に　悪の心が　あるかぎり\n
よみがえるで　あろう・・・
column6: But know this...So long as there is evil in this world, I shall one day return, without fail...

column5:
われは　マサカド\n
ジパングの　王なり・・・
column6:
I am Masakado...true sovereign...\n
of Jipang...

column5:
ジライア　ツナデ　オロチ丸は\n
ついに　大門教を　倒し・・・
column6: Finally, Ziria, Tsunade, and Orochimaru have vanquished the Cult of Daimon...

column5:
よみがった　マサカドも\n
ふたたび　地中深くに　封じ込めた
column6: ...and once again sealed Masakado within the depths of the earth.

column5:
\n
　　　　　そして・・・
column6: Then...
column7: NOTE: i'd like to center this, but space is, uh, kind of at a premium for this one battle...

column5:
クククク・・・　どうだジライア！\n
かなしいか？　くやしいか？\n
これで　ジパングは　わがものよ！
column6: What's the matter, Ziria? Are you sad, perhaps? Do you curse your own weakness? Finally...Jipang is mine!

column5:
ぐふふふふ・・・\n
まだ　勝ったと思うなよ！\n
邪神斎さまの　力は　これからだ！
column6: Bwahahaha...You thought you'd won, didn't you? You haven't seen the true power of Jashinsai yet!

column5:
ポンポコリン！！　ぶぁかめ！！\n
オレは　大門教の殺し屋！
column6:
Ponpokorin! You idiot!\n
I'm Kinta the Tanuki!

column5:
// WARNING: continues previous box
タヌキの金太さまだ！！
column6:
\n
An assassin sent by the Cult of Daimon!

column5:
おまえ　みたいな　ヘンな顔\n
この世に　ふたりも\n
いるわきゃないだろ！！
column6: You shoulda known there couldn't be anyone else in this world with a face as dumb as yours!

column5:
おまえ　みたいなやつに\n
マサカドさまが　たおせるもんか
column6: You'll never defeat Masakado-sama!

column5:
// WARNING: continues previous box
大門教のおそろしさ　みせてやる！！
column6:
\n
It's time you learned how terrifying the Cult of Daimon really is!

column5:
へへへ　大門教の　おそろしさ\n
わかったか　バカめ！\n
ポンポコリン！
column6: Heh heh heh! That'll teach you to mess with the Cult of Daimon! Ponpokorin!

column5: ヒエー！　ポンポコリン！
column6: Eeep! Ponpokorin!

column5:
ごめんなさい！　ごめんなさい！\n
地下の　つづらの中に\n
大ひげぬきが　あります
column6:
I'm sorry, I'm sorry!\n
I hid the giant tweezers in the casket down below!

column5:
大ひげぬきを　大ナマズに\n
使えば　岩が　くずれて\n
とおれるようになるんです！
column6: If you use those tweezers to pull out one of Namazu's whiskers, the boulder will crumble and you'll be able to go through!

column5: ポンポコリン！
column6: Ponpokorin!

column5:
わしが　剣の名人　ボクデンだ！\n
おまえなんか　ヘのカッパだよ！\n
どっからでも　かかってらっしゃい！
column6:
I am Bokuden, master of the blade!\n
Think you can beat me, kid?\n
Have at you!

column5: ポンポコリン！
column6: Ponpokorin!

column5:
おれが　火の勇者　ジライアさまだ！\n
ワッハッハ　おどろいたか！\n
どうれ　こらしめてやるぞ！
column6:
I'm Ziria, the Fire Hero!\n
Wahaha! You scared?\n
C'mon, show me what you got!

column5: ポンポコリン！
column6: Ponpokorin!

column5:
ホッホッホ　黄門じゃよ！\n
ジライアよ　大門教に　さからっちゃ\n
いかんのう！　おしおきじゃ！！
column6:
Hoh hoh hoh! I am Koumon!\n
Ziria, how dare you oppose the Cult of Daimon? Prepare to be punished!

column5: シンプは　正体をあらわした！
column6: The head priest reveals his true form!

column5:
クソして　ねてろ！\n
この国を　ぜーんぶ　大門教に\n
してやるんだ　ポコポコリン！
column6: Serves you right! This country belongs to the Cult of Daimon! Ponpokorin!

column5:
ゆるして　ください！！　おらたちは\n
大門教の　１３人衆の　１番手\n
ゴーモンに　のせられた　だけです！
column6: Forgive us! We were tricked by Goumon, one of the Thirteen Daimon Cultists, that's all!

column5:
いま　目が　さめました\n
やっぱり　おらたちも\n
このジパングが　大好きなんです！
column6:
My eyes have been opened.\n
Yes, we tanuki also love Jipang!

column5:
大門教は　全国の　ようかいや\n
かいぶつを　てなずけて\n
あやつろうと　してるんです！！
column6: The Daimonists are manipulating youkai and monsters all over the country into doing their bidding!

column5:
お城に　入れるように　しておきます\n
城の　地下にいる　ゴーモンを\n
やっつけて　くださいね！！
column6: I'll have the way to the castle opened for you. Please, go to the dungeons and defeat Goumon once and for all!

column5:
おらたちは　山に　もどって\n
ひっそりと　オーエンします\n
ポンポコリン！
column6: We'll return to the mountains and cheer for you in secret. Ponpokorin!

column5:
だから　いうたやろ\n
わて　つおいんだす！\n
ほな　さいなら
column6:
Told ya I'm pretty strong!\n
Buh-bye!

column5:
ほんま　かなわんわ・・・\n
あんた　強いでんな
column6:
I was no match for you...\n
You're tough, I'll give ya that.

column5:
せやけど　わて\n
まだ　ぎょうさん\n
ゼニ　かくしてまんのや
column6: But I gots more cash stashed away!

column5:
ほたら　また\n
あとで　会いましょか\n
ほな　さいなら
column6: See ya 'round, pal. Buh-bye!

column5:
おれだ！\n
大門教１３人衆の　１０番手\n
ムテキオーだ！　忘れたか！！
column6: It is I! The tenth of the Thirteen Daimon Cultists, Mutekiou!

column5:
どうやっても　この島は\n
出られんぞ！　ハハハハ\n
地獄へ　戻れ！！
column6:
You will never leave this island! Bwahahaha!\n
You're going back to Hell!

column5:
この　ムテキオーが　負けるとは\n
これが　友情の力か・・・\n
しかし　まだ　大門教は・・・
column6:
How could you possibly defeat me...?\n
Is this the power of friendship? But the Cult of Daimon stands yet...!

column5:
大門教１３人衆の　１０番手\n
ムテキオーを　倒した！！\n
あと　残り　３人！　３人！！
column6:
You have defeated Mutekiou, the tenth of the Thirteen Daimon Cultists!\n
There are only three cultists left!

column5:
ジライア！！　戦う前に　ひとつ\n
きいて　おこう！！\n
人間は　なぜ　苦しむのだ？
column6:
Ziria...Let me ask you a question before our duel.\n
Why is it that mankind suffers so?

column5:
ジライア！！　それは　人間が\n
弱い心を　もっているからよ！！\n
では　人間は　なぜ　なやむのだ？
column6:
It is because their hearts are weak!\n
And why is it that they worry so?

column5:
ジライア！！　それは　人間が\n
弱い心を　もっているからよ！！\n
ちがうか　ジライア？
column6:
It is because their hearts are weak!\n
Can you deny my words, Ziria?

column5:
わしは　そのような　弱い人間を\n
もっと　もっと　強い　生きものに\n
かえてやるのよぉ！！
column6: I seek to turn these weak humans into strong and mighty creatures!

column5:
それこそが　人間に　とっての\n
しあわせ！！　あらたな　理想郷の\n
はじまりなのだ！！
column6: That is how mankind will achieve true happiness! That is the only way to the promised land!

column5:
そのために　古いものは\n
すべて　ほろびなくては　ならぬ！！\n
そうは　思わぬか？　ジライア！！
column6:
To create a new world, the old one must first be destroyed.\n
Do you not think so, Ziria?

column5:
クククク・・　どうれ・・\n
この　邪神斎さまが　喰って\n
たましいを　アクマにしてやるわ！
column6: Heh heh heh heh...Is something the matter? I shall devour you, and turn your soul into a demon!

column5:
なかなか　やるのう　ジライア！\n
だが　今のは　ほんの　おあそびじゃ！\n
わしの　本当の　姿を　見よ！
column6:
I'm impressed, Ziria!\n
However, I was merely toying with you.\n
Behold my true form!

column5:
邪神斎は\n
ルシフェラーに　変身した！
column6: Jashinsai transformed into Lucifeller!

column5:
おろかものめ！\n
火の勇者の　ちからなど\n
伝説にしか　すぎぬわ！！
column6:
Foolish creatures!\n
The power of the Fire Heroes is nothing more than a folk tale!

column5:
ば・・ばかな・・・\n
この　アクマ族の　邪神斎さまより
column6:
Th-This cannot be...\n
I am Jashinsai of the Demon clan!

column5:
// WARNING: continues previous box
ちからを　もった　ものが
column6:
\n
How could mortals stronger than me

column5: この世に　あらわれるとは・・・\n
column6: exist in this world...?\n

You...are terrifying...\n
Fire Heroes...!

column5:
く・・くやしい・・・！！\n
アクマ族の　まけじゃ！！\n
う・・・うわっーーっ！！
column6:
C-Curses...\n
This is the end of the Demon clan...!\n
GRAAAGH!!

column5: マサカドさまー！！
column6: MASAKADO-SAMAAA!!

column5:
ええい！　みじゅくものめが！\n
うでを　みがいて　でなおしてまいれ！
column6:
Tch! You weakling!\n
Come back after you train some more!

column5:
みごとじゃ！　ジライア！\n
おぬしに　必殺の　ボクデン斬りを\n
さずけよう！
column6:
A splendid display!\n
Ziria! I shall teach you my special technique, the Bokuden Slash!

column5:
ボクデン斬りは　おぬしの　心が\n
無になったとき　剣の　切れあじが\n
するどくなる　技じゃ！
column6: By emptying your mind of needless thoughts, you can increase the sharpness of your blade! That is the Bokuden Slash!

column5:
ジライアよ　剣の道は　長く　険しい！\n
日々　修行に　はげみ　かならずや\n
大門教を　たおすのじゃぞ！
column6: Ziria! The way of the sword is long and steep! Train hard every day, and you will surely defeat the Cult of Daimon!

column5: 必殺剣　ボクデン斬りを　会得した
column6:
You have learned the special technique\n
Bokuden Slash.

column5:
そのていどの　ウデまえで　一人前の\n
剣士を　きどるとは　かたはらいたい！\n
かおを　あらって　でなおすが　よい！
column6: You dishonor all fencers with this shameful display! Return to your training before trying again!

column5:
みごとな　ウデまえで　ござった！\n
せっしゃの　秘剣　ムサシ斬りを\n
おしえて　しんぜよう！
column6:
A splendid display of skill!\n
Allow me to teach you my special technique, the Musashi Slash!

column5:
ムサシ斬りは　風よりも　早く\n
剣を　きらめかせ　つづけざまに\n
相手を　きる技でござる！
column6: Focus your mind into the blade and slice your foe again and again, swifter than the wind. That is the Musashi Slash!

column5:
ジライアよ！\n
おぬしのような　強い　剣士に\n
出会えて　しあわせで　ござった！
column6: Ziria! It was a great honor to face such a talented fencer as yourself!

column5:
剣の道は　とおい！\n
せっしゃも　まだまだ\n
修行が　たりぬで　ござるな！
column6: The way of the sword stretches far indeed! I must resume my training!

column5: 必殺剣ムサシ斬りを　会得した
column6:
You have learned the special technique\n
Musashi Slash.

column5:
思い知ったか　ジライア！\n
きさまなど　たとえ　天地が　さけても\n
この　ジュウベイには　勝てん！！
column6:
Do you understand, Ziria?\n
You'll never beat me, not even if the heavens and earth split asunder!

column5:
ムネン！　このジュウベイが\n
負けるとは　だがジライアよ\n
おぬしと　戦って　わかった
column6: You have bested me! I never thought this day would come...Ziria. During our fight, I realized something.

column5:
おぬしの　剣には　勇気と　愛が\n
あふれておる！　それが　火の勇者の\n
強さなのだな　わしが　まちがっていた
column6: Your sword brims over with courage and love! I was wrong: You have earned the title of Fire Hero, without a doubt!

column5:
今まで　ぐろうした\n
つみほろぼしに　わしの　必殺剣\n
ジュウベイ斬りを　さずけよう
column6: To apologize for my rudeness, I will teach you my special technique, the Juubei Slash.

column5:
ジュウベイ斬りは　敵の攻撃を\n
そっくり　そのまま　相手に\n
はねかえす　技じゃ！
column6:
Watch your opponent's movements and reflect their attack back at them.\n
That is the Juubei Slash!

column5:
大門教を　倒せるのは　おぬししか\n
おらん！　まよわず　自分の道を\n
ゆくのじゃ　ジライアよ！
column6: Only you can stop the Cult of Daimon. Keep following your path with unwavering confidence, Ziria!

column5: 必殺剣ジュウベイ斬りを　会得した
column6:
You have learned the special technique\n
Juubei Slash.

column5:
だめだ　それでは　わが剣は　とても\n
使いこなせまい！　強くなれ\n
ジライア！　そして　わしを　たおせ！
column6:
You will never master my technique like this! Get stronger, Ziria!\n
Get stronger, and surpass me!

column5:
さすがだ　ジライア！　おぬしなら\n
わが奥義　シュウサク斬りを\n
使いこなせよう！
column6:
Well done, Ziria!\n
You have mastered my special technique, the Shuusaku Slash.

column5:
シュウサク斬りは　剣に　アシュラの\n
力が　宿り　一刀の　もとに\n
相手の　息の根をとめる　魔の剣じゃ！
column6: Channel the power of Asura and cut through your opponent in a single, lethal strike. That is the Shuusaku Slash!

column5:
ジライアよ！　おぬしが　大門教を\n
倒し　再び　平和の　来る日を\n
楽しみにしておるぞ！　さあ　行け！
column6: Ziria. I look forward to the day you will defeat the Cult of Daimon and bring peace back to Jipang. Now go, young hero!

column5: 必殺剣シュウサク斬りを　会得した
column6:
You have learned the special technique\n
Shuusaku Slash.

column5: ポンポコリン！
column6: Ponpokorin!

column5:
これ　ジライアよ！\n
わしじゃ　ガマ仙人じゃ！\n
ししょうの　わしに　勝てるかな！
column6:
Ziria, you naughty boy!\n
It is I, the Toad Hermit!!\n
You cannot defeat your master!

column5:
バカめ！\n
また　ノコノコ　きたな\n
筑波山で　クソして　ねてろ！
column6:
Hah! Back for more?\n
You shoulda stayed on Mount Tsukuba!

column5:
へへへ　大門教の　おそろしさ\n
わかったか　バカめ！\n
ポンポコリン！
column6: Heh heh heh! That'll teach you to mess with the Cult of Daimon! Ponpokorin!

column5: ヒエー！　ポンポコリン！
column6: Eeep! Ponpokorin!

column5:
ごめんなさい！　ごめんなさい！\n
地下の　つづらの中に\n
大ひげぬきが　あります
column6:
I'm sorry, I'm sorry!\n
I hid the giant tweezers in the casket down below!

column5:
大ひげぬきを　大ナマズに\n
使えば　岩が　くずれて\n
とおれるようになるんです！
column6: If you use those tweezers to pull out one of Namazu's whiskers, the boulder will crumble and you'll be able to go through!
